A great game with friends. Play as a survivor or as the killer. For me, I most often play as the killer. It is a fun game with great graphics and really good sound design. I have so much fun running around hunting down survivors and sacrificing them to the entity. The game mechanics are decent. As with everything there is always room for improvement. All the killers are unique and each have their own little quirks. Great choices of customisation.  I would recommend it.

Game has been getting worse and worse since 2020. Behavior constantly ignores the community wants and criticisms, instead focusing on ways to make quick money. I have been hoping one day it would get better, but now it's worse than it ever has been.. 

They are making every killer the same boring formula, and refuse to acknowledge that most of the maps suck. Every map they have recently added to the game has been awful. There hasn't been a new map in a while, but even the most recent one is garbage.

It sucks because this game used to be so fun, and now it's literally a desiccated corpse of what it once was.

Eu demorei a jogar DBD, justamente por achar que não daria conta de fazer os objetivos, fico muito nervouser.
Mas enfim dei uma chance a mim mesma, e foi ótimo, apesar de achar que ainda terei um infarto jogando esse jogo. Gostei demais dos sustos, do lance de aumentar as batidas do coração de acordo com a aproximação do assassino. Minha mão chega a suar! Eu nem choro, só fico tremendo. kkkkkkk
Minha decepção com ele foi somente relacionado aos players tóxicos que, como na maioria dos jogos online, aparecem no rank mais elevado do jogo, e se acha no direito de te xingar de tudo quanto é coisa. Sou véia e sou deboísta, e infelizmente isso me afeta um pouco.

I do love this game and I even been playing it since consoles, there is a huge amount of characters and survivors you can play and experiment with to make your trails really intense and fun. That is if you can even find a game or get past the constant disconnects. I have to wait 10-20 minutes each time I ready to even play a match, and on top of it sometimes when I do get a game in I get kicked out instantly. all I can say is its a really fun game if it actually works, but due to these issues alone it really grinds my gears.

Developers that pave their way for success while disregarding the fans criticism and concerns are no better than the lying politicians out there in the world. History will repeat itself yet again with this story. Creating all these wonderful cosmetics and new maps, but in the end this game will be remembered as a wilting flower. To only bring beauty in life is to create a rotting image in the end.

Dead by daylight is a fantastic game. In the right conditions.
It's one of those fantastic party games, you know, the type of game that's fun with a group of friends while in voice, one that you can get a lot of laughs out of and spend a lot of time crushing your ribs with laughter until you literally cannot breathe anymore.

However, the unfortunate negative defining factor of this game is the community.
The community in this game is one of the most hate-filled, trust-less, unrelenting communities I have ever bared witness to (excluding games like CS;GO and league simply due to the fact they are way more popular).

Survivors that abuse killers that then abuse survivors in an infinite repeating cycle that never ends.
DS is used in a toxic way > Killer dislikes this > Killer then abuses survivor using DS the proper way (to stop themselves being tunnelled) > Survivor gets angry and uses DS in a toxic way.
This is just a small example of the the cycle I was talking about.
If you have friends, I do recommend this game.
If you have a lot of patience, I also recommend this game.
But I do not recommend this game if you're looking for a fair match against players who're respectful and willing to not be fun-sucking vampires. They don't exist and never will. 

TL;DR
- Fun with friends.
- Bad community.
- Not very fun solo.
- Toxic gameplay loop between survivors and killers.

Dead by Daylight is a top secret torture method that is developed by Behaviour; this game is very bad and I don't recommend it to anyone, you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game, thankfully spending about 30 minutes in Dead by Daylight makes you retarded; in Dead by Daylight you can visit very interesting locations: like Ormond, or Haddonfield, ... , nothing else; this game will bring you very fun experiences and fond memories; you can play as the survivors who need to repair generators to escape, playing survivor is very easy considering this game is very balanced, the only thing you need to watch out for are random survivors that have the intellect of a Plants vs Zombies pea shooter; you can also play the killer who kills the survivors, don't worry out of every killer only like three are viable on high mmr, and you need to apply pressure to 4 people at the same time while you're playing padded jaws Trapper; thankfully after 6 years this game still feels like it's in alpha, it's not Dead by Daylight if the map doesn't have shi*t hitboxes and is full with bugs; this game also consists of very fun cosmetics, like a 15$ Trapper skin and pure cancer; overall this game is very s*hit, it's also like 100$ with every DLC.
